attributes.action: Reverse the ban on Lord's Prayer in cinemas
attributes.background: we need this decision reversed. This is a Christian country, what about our beliefs and culture. Enough already of "offending" others.  About time uk got a grip of this ridiculous political correctness.  O the irony

rejection.details:
This decision is a result of the policy of Digital Cinema Media, not a decision by the Government or Parliament.

You may wish to write to DCM to make your views known.
